definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: receptacle, wallet (?) (prop. collector) (on form cf. Lag:BN p.127 Ba:NB § 156 b Kö:ii.1, § 76:4)—only in 1Sa 17:40 and he put them [the stones] [[בִּכְלִי הָרׂעִים אֲשֶׁר־לוֹ וּבַיַּלְקוּט]] in the shepherd's receptacle which he had, even (?) in the wallet (? such as every shepherd carried, hence art.); but prob. del. [[ו]] before ´[[בַּיַּל]] (LXX The We Klo Bu HPS), and regard [[לוֹ]]…[[בִּכְלְי]] as gloss (We Bu HPS).
